title: SICK TO DEATH OF RIOT CHANGING CHAMPS EACH PATCH
body: ENOUGH IS ENOUGH RIOT. I, and many players I've talked to in-game are sick to death of you changing which runes and masteries work best with our favourite champs after every patch. I spend many games in normals working out which runes & masteries are best on my champs so I can comfortably play them in ranked but then Riot changes the champs after most patches making me lose. Fair enough buff & nerf champs to suit, but dont go changing the champs so much that I have to redo masteries & runes after every patch. This affects my ranked climb as these rune & mastery changes affect my game too much making me unfamiliar to the champs I've played for so long. Those of you who read this please speak up, this is beyond ridiculous! I am really angry about this.
